issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5. Description:
When I installed the CLI today I noticed the following npm warning:
{code}
npm WARN deprecated github-flavored-markdown@1.0.1: This project is long out of date. Use 'marked' instead.
{code}

Since the CLI install could potentially fail if this dependency is no longer available at some time in the future, we should consider replacing it soon.

h5. Steps to reproduce:
1) Install the cli from github with:
sudo npm install -g git://github.com/appcelerator/titanium.git
2) Watch the terminal output

h5. Result:
npm warning about "out of date" package

h5. Expected Result:
No warnings, no out-of-date packages as dependencies
fields.summary: CLI: 3.2.0 CLI install warns of out-of-date dependency "github-flavored-markdown@1.0.1"
fields.environment:
Mac OS 10.8.5
Xcode 5.0.2
CLI: 3.2.0
Alloy: 1.3.0
Titanium SDK version  3.2.0.v20131113133242
Titanium Studio, build: 3.2.0.201311122225

comments.body: Note that this is documented as an issue here: https://github.com/visionmedia/dox/issues/94. It is possible to delete a package, but given the contributor, I think that's unlikely: https://npmjs.org/doc/cli/npm-unpublish.html
Closing ticket as the issue will not fix.
